docs.snippet: With money secured from Albany for its top policy priority of prekindergarten classes, Mayor Bill de Blasio and his team are eager to begin a new phase with the public and the press....
docs.lead_paragraph: With money secured from Albany for its top policy priority of prekindergarten classes, Mayor Bill de Blasio and his team are eager to begin a new phase with the public and the press.
docs.abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio and his team are eager to begin a new phase with the public and the press, now that money is secured from Albany for its top policy priority of prekindergarten classes.

headline.main: At a Momentary Peace With Albany, de Blasio Sees an Opportunity to Reboot

docs.snippet: Patients may soon get an unprecedented look at how their doctor compares to other physicians, after Medicare announced Wednesday it plans to publicly post billing data for more than 880,000 practitioners....

docs.snippet: The stops on Bo Ryan's coaching resume sound like a road trip across southern Wisconsin, from Platteville to Milwaukee to Madison. He has been pacing sidelines for so long in this state, it's hard to imagine Ryan being anywhere but the Midwest....

docs.snippet: Michael Brantley atoned for a rare error by hitting a two-run sungle in the ninth inning off new Oakland closer Jim Johnson that helped the Cleveland Indians salvage a split of a day-night doubleheader with a 6-4 win over the Athletics in the nigh...
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Brantley atoned for a rare error by hitting a two-run sungle in the ninth inning off new Oakland closer Jim Johnson that helped the Cleveland Indians salvage a split of a day-night doubleheader with a 6-4 win over the Athletics in the nightcap Wednesday.

headline.main: Indians Rally to Split Doubleheader With A's

docs.lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods said on his website that he had surgery on Monday in Utah for a pinched nerve and would need time to rehabilitate.
docs.abstract: Tiger Woods withdraws from the Masters tournament for the first time since 1994, saying he will need time to recuperate from back surgery for a pinched nerve.

headline.main: Back Surgery Puts Woods Out of the Masters for the First Time Since 1994
